com.davesartory.launchpad2

Interface Launchpad

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLaunchpad, VirtualLaunchpad

    public interface Launchpad
    Author:
    dave

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void clear()
      Set all buttons to off
      void drawHorizontalLine(int row, int startCol, int endCol, LpColor c)
      Draw a horizontal line on the grid
      void drawRectangle(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY, LpColor c)
      Draw a rectangle on the grid
      void drawVerticalLine(int col, int startRow, int endRow, LpColor c)
      Draw a vertical line on the grid
      List<LpButton> getAllButtons()
      Return list of all buttons on Launchpad
      List<LpButton> getAllSideButtons()
      Return list of side set of round buttons
      List<LpButton> getAllTopButtons()
      Return list of top set of round buttons
      LpButton getButton(int x, int y)
      Return the grid button at specified location
      LpButton getButton(LpButtonType b)
      Return a given round button by enum/name
      List<LpButton> getGrid()
      Return list of all 64 grid buttons
      LpSynth getSynth()
      Get the reference to the synth for midi audio playback
      void initSynth()
      Initialize the synth if audio is desired

        LpButton getButton(int x,
                   int y)
        Return the grid button at specified location
        Parameters:
        x - row (starting from 0, top)
        y - col (starting from 0, left)
        Returns:
        LpButton at that location

      • getButton

        LpButton getButton(LpButtonType b)
        Return a given round button by enum/name
        Parameters:
        b - the named button to get
        Returns:
        LpButton at named location

        Draw a rectangle on the grid
        Parameters:
        startX - starting point column
        startY - starting point row
        endX - ending point column
        endY - ending point row
        c - LpColor color constant
